name: streams_symbol
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stocktwits.
Tool description: StockTwits provides a social communications platform and social graph for anyone interested in the markets and investing.
API description: Fetches the most recent messages for a specified stock symbol from the StockTwits API.

is_id.description: Ticker symbol, Stock ID, or RIC code of the symbol.

since.description: Returns results with an ID greater than (more recent than) the specified ID.

max.description: Returns results with an ID less than (older than) or equal to the specified ID.

limit.description: The number of messages to retrieve, with a default of 20. The maximum allowed value is 30.

callback.description: Define your own callback function name, add this parameter as the value.

filter.description: Filter messages by links, charts, videos, or top.
